title: Sample Book, 2011-22-5, 1984
medium: Woven  fabric containing silk, linen, rayon, polyester, flax, modacrylic, wool, paper support
provenance: 2011, given to the Cooper-Hewitt by the Bard Graduate Center. Merle Lindby-Young gave to Bard for inclusion in the Knoll Textiles exhibition in 2011.
creditline: Gift of the Bard Graduate Center: Decorative Arts, Design History, Material Culture
description: Portfolio containing six designs for woven fabric wallcoverings. Each of the designs contains a large swatch with smaller swatches showing colorways underneath. Portfolio folds out in accordion style. The samples include Firenze, Panama, Mojave, Eton, Eton Square, and Chelsea.
